It has been two years. 

Today we stand with the families and friends who lost their loved ones in the Parkland shooting. 

Students and those who tried to protect them lost their lives on a school campus. It makes no sense. We remember them today.

Two years after the horrific Parkland shooting, my heart still breaks. And every day in America gun violence traumatizes more communities. 

I am deeply inspired by the students who have turned their grief into activism. 

We must follow their lead. We must act now.
